extension.disclaimer: Developed in Kodi Jarvis. Should work on Kodi Gotham and up.
extension.description: Multi-emulator front-end for Kodi scalable to collections of thousands of ROMs. Includes offline scrapers for MAME and No-Intro ROM sets and also supports scrapping ROM metadata, thumbs and fanarts online. ROM auditing for No-Intro ROMs using No-Intro XML DATs. Launching of general applications, games and standalone applications is also available.
